prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a tree with multiple heads and has a playful, friendly nature.
Imagine a giant plant Pokemon with a strong connection to nature and a serene personality.
Design an oversized Pokemon that combines elements of palm trees and coconuts, perfect for tropical regions.
